        Parameters:
        requestID - the unique id of request
        requeststatus - what status u are looking for
        start - which textView u want to change
        intent - the changed content of textView

      • add_new_user

        public void add_new_user(User user)
        This function is to add and edit user information and store them to firestone. The primary key is username, if username not exist, will add a new user document if username exist, the new information will cover the old information.
        Parameters:
        user -
